column1: Regular traffic reports will resume Thursday December 17 at 4:00 p.m.

column4: Euclid Ave at S Ashland Ave
column5: The eastbound lane is blocked due to water main repair.  Two way traffic is being maintained.

column3: I-75/I-71 at the Brent Spence Bridge:
column4: The bridge is closed until further notice due to fire damage from a previous collision.

column3: I-75/I-71 at the Brent Spence Bridge:
column4: Details, detours, and updates from the KY Transportation Cabinet.
